messages.content: What is the latest version of ComfyUI-Prompt-Composer as of 08.03.2024?
The latest version of ComfyUI-Prompt-Composer as of 08.03.2024 is 1.6.
What was added in version 1.6 of ComfyUI-Prompt-Composer?
In version 1.6 of ComfyUI-Prompt-Composer, the Prompt Composer Multiple Text was updated to have 10 slots, and bug fixes and optimizations were made.
What was added in version 1.5 of ComfyUI-Prompt-Composer?

In version 1.5 of ComfyUI-Prompt-Composer, the _Custom Lists_ node was added, while the _Effect_ and _Styler_ nodes were deprecated and will not receive future updates. Bug fixes and optimizations were also made.
What was added in version 1.4 of ComfyUI-Prompt-Composer?
In version 1.4 of ComfyUI-Prompt-Composer, an _active_ switch was added for fast by-pass of nodes.
What changes were made in version 1.3 of ComfyUI-Prompt-Composer?

In version 1.3 of ComfyUI-Prompt-Composer, the Assembler node was removed, the _Grouping_ node and _Merge_ node were added, and all nodes were updated to have STRING output instead of TUPLE for easier connection to other nodes or directly to the ClipTextEncode.
What was included in version 1.2 of ComfyUI-Prompt-Composer?
Version 1.2 of ComfyUI-Prompt-Composer included output prompt optimization and bug fixes.
When was version 1.0 of ComfyUI-Prompt-Composer released?
Version 1.0 of ComfyUI-Prompt-Composer was released on 29.12.2023.
What is ComfyUI Prompt Composer?
ComfyUI Prompt Composer is a suite of tools for prompt management in ComfyUI.
How can you install ComfyUI Prompt Composer?

You can install ComfyUI Prompt Composer either through ComfyUI Manager by searching for 'florestefano1975' and clicking the install button, or manually by cloning the repository into the custom_nodes folder of your ComfyUI installation.
What are the steps to manually update ComfyUI Prompt Composer?

To manually update ComfyUI Prompt Composer, open the terminal in the comfyui-prompt-composer folder, navigate to custom_nodes, then to comfyui-prompt-composer, pull the latest changes using 'git pull', and restart ComfyUI.
What is the purpose of the Custom Lists Node in ComfyUI Prompt Composer?
The Custom Lists Node reads the lists contained in the custom-lists folder and creates a selector/weight pair for each, allowing users to create and manage custom lists for their prompts.
How can you create custom lists for the Custom Lists Node?

To create custom lists for the Custom Lists Node, create TXT files in the custom-lists folder and insert the selector entries into each of them. You can create lists with simple items or libraries with entire prompts.
What is the purpose of the Single Text Node and Multiple Text Node in ComfyUI Prompt Composer?

The Single Text Node contains a typing box and a slider to adjust its weight, while the Multiple Text Node contains six typing boxes with sliders to adjust their weights. Both nodes allow users to input and weigh text elements for their prompts.
What is the SDXL Turbo Workflow in ComfyUI Prompt Composer?

The SDXL Turbo Workflow is a configuration available in the workflow folder of ComfyUI Prompt Composer. It includes some of the custom nodes already inserted and ready to use for advanced photorealism.
What are some other projects related to ComfyUI Prompt Composer?
Some other projects related to ComfyUI Prompt Composer are ComfyUI Portrait Master and ComfyUI StabilityAI Suite.
